<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrinfoquery">InstrInfoQuery</a> provides an interface to query additional information for instructions like metadata or keywords like nsw, which provides conservative results if the users specified it is safe to use. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrinfoquery/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Wrapper to query additional information for instructions like metadata or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// keywords like nsw, which provides conservative results if those cannot</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// be safely used.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/simplifyquery/#ad029c8abde2f42c8d5837bd5515bb18e"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrinfoquery">InstrInfoQuery</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/simplifyquery/#ad029c8abde2f42c8d5837bd5515bb18e">IIQ</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Controls whether simplifications are allowed to constrain the range of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// possible values for uses of undef. If it is false, simplifications are not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// allowed to assume a particular value for a use of undef for example.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/simplifyquery/#a3b12da4ca5cd8514b068a30f8716db31"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/simplifyquery/#a3b12da4ca5cd8514b068a30f8716db31">CanUseUndef</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/simplifyquery/#a343add975d940af757f1254276d93640"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/simplifyquery/#a343add975d940af757f1254276d93640">SimplifyQuery</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/simplifyquery/#a0ffb6d79f6befe2030328bd1d7110feb">DL</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;CXTI = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">      : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/simplifyquery/#a0ffb6d79f6befe2030328bd1d7110feb">DL</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/simplifyquery/#a0ffb6d79f6befe2030328bd1d7110feb">DL</a>), <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/simplifyquery/#a30647c42c8c40890c577ba5b4ab16468">CxtI</a>(CXTI) &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
